backend/main.mo: Defines story, user, comment, and report types plus sorting and distance utilities, with storage mixins and logic for comparing and locating stories.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature traceability data mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their roles in UI, logic, and backend integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with geolocation permissions policy and root mount container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, view routing, UI interactivity guard, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: Story creation dialog supporting drafts, manual or automatic location, image upload, and full form state management.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryFAB.t: Floating action button that triggers story creation via a stylized plus button.
frontend/src/components/DistanceKmSlider: Reusable slider component for selecting distance in kilometers with optional disabled state and helper text.
frontend/src/components/FilterBar.tsx: Renders category filter buttons allowing users to switch between story categories.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows a simple footer with a copyright notice and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays navigation, theme toggle, and authentication controls with admin options when applicable.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive Leaflet-based map with marker clustering, search, and story selection handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to choose a username and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/SortControl.tsx: Dropdown for selecting story sorting options such as newest or most liked.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Card displaying a story preview with actions for liking, pinning, commenting, and sharing.
frontend/src/components/StoryDetailDialo: Dialog showing full story details with comments, interactions, reporting, editing, and admin actions.
frontend/src/components/StoryFeed.tsx: Grid listing stories using StoryCard with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/WallpaperSetting: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDrafts.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, fetch, create, and update story drafts using the authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocationPermiss: Manages geolocation permission state, diagnostics, and location requests with secure-context and browser support checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Wraps Internet Identity auth client, exposing identity, login/logout, status flags, and an authentication provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Offers assorted React Query hooks for user profiles, stories, admin checks, and other backend interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useReverseGeocodedPla: Fetches and returns a human-readable place name for given coordinates with loading and error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and layout-related utility rules.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Provides mapping functions to get display labels and colors for story categories.
frontend/src/lib/distanceFilterDebug.ts: Provides opt-in debug logging for distance filtering, exposing helpers to enable, disable, and log filter decisions via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/locationFilter.ts: Checks whether a story is within a given radius using Haversine distance and triggers optional debug logging.
Defines UI text for various geolocation permission states and provides a helper to retrieve the correct copy.
frontend/src/lib/reverseGeocode.ts: Performs reverse geocoding via Nominatim with caching and fallbacks, extracting a concise place name from responses.
frontend/src/lib/storySorting.ts: Implements multiple story-sorting strategies including newest, nearest, and popularity-based, and maps them to backend sort options.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility helpers for class merging, distance calculation, and formatting distance/location strings.
frontend/src/lib/wallpaperValidation.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminModerationPage.t: Admin-only dashboard for viewing, dismissing, and acting on story reports with story detail viewing support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main user-facing page managing feed/map views, story creation, location permissions, filtering, and sorting logic.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page component showing posted, liked, and pinned stories with tabbed navigation and a shared story grid renderer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, pending requests, and versioned project state.
